import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addToCart } from '../../store/actions/cartAction' const CartProduct = ({product}) => { const add = e => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); e.stopPropagation() dispatch(addToCart()) } return (
{product.name}
{product.quantity} x {product.price}
) } export default CartProduct
